name: goatcounter
tagline: A privacy-friendly web analytics tool with simple traffic insights
description: GoatCounter is a lightweight and privacy-friendly web analytics tool. It provides basic metrics, referrers, and pagesviews without collecting personal data, designed to be a simple alternative to Google Analytics.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track website visits without cookies or personal data collection

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Compliant with GDPR and privacy regulations without requiring cookie banners

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal JavaScript footprint with negligible impact on page load times

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep all analytics data on your own server with complete ownership
